about_the_game:
Welcome to The Merry Fairy, a magical cottage deep in the forest of Fairyland. You are invited to spend one summer's month as an honored guest in Fairy's beautiful home. Your only goal is to relax and, if you feel so inclined, to discover your very own magic.




The Merry Fairy is an enchanted cottage that you can visit from afar. Open this magical door to Fairyland and let your imagination be transported into this gentle realm, as you go about your day. In Fairyland you can journal, decorate, gather pretty things, and explore Fairy's creative space.




Fairy suspects you might be a magical creature, like her! And the best way she knows to explore the depths of one's heart is to journal. This is why she left you a gift - a beautiful, enchanted journal where you can write down your thoughts, and that you can decorate as you wish! Gather whatever you like from Fairyland, and use it to build your scrapbook journal. And when you feel that a chapter in your heart is concluded, you can take your journal home, as a PDF file to store locally.



Fairy's cottage is full of delights and useful tools to discover your magic. As a matter of fact, Fairy's friends are keen to help you, too! They gathered and chatted and agreed on the best way to support you. One of them will check up on you every half an hour. They will come by The Merry Fairy and gently knock on your window. If you are ready for a visit, you may let them in, and talk about magic. Or Fairyland. Or Fairy. Or about many other things!
detailed_description:
About me


Hi! My name is Laura and I live somewhere in the middle of nowhere, at a farm in Sweden. The Merry Fairy is inspired by my life and I hope to bring you closer to nature.

short_description: The Merry Fairy is a cozy idle game where you collect beautiful decorations and create your scrapbook journal in a fairytale environment. Invite the enchanted Fairyland vibe into your life and discover your magic through the stories of Fairy and her friends!
